name: Public True Name
description: Grants other Fae Edge to certain abilities because all Fae know True Name.

name: Static
description: Costs 1 extra Fate token to assume a different Form and has 1 fewer base Form.

name: Metallic Bane
description: Cannot use Tools with metal. Touching metal causes 1 wound. Grant Edge to opponents in contests of Battle Clash with metal.

name: Truth Bound
description: Unable to tell a lie. Take 1 wound every time say something False.

name: Primal Magic
description: No bonus 10 Asset Points. Cannot use Tools without granting Edge in Battle Clash.

name: Arithmomania
description: Obsessed with order. Grants defensive Edge in Cunning Deception contests. Battle movement treated one Level lower.

name: Invitations
description: Cannot breach Physical Walls of a Regency and must enter with Regent. +1 delay to travel between Realms.

name: All the World's a Stage
description: Cannot use Destiny Agency. Has 2 fewer Fate tokens.

name: Sympathetic Blood
description: If wound another Fae, receive 1 wound.

name: Dryad
description: Must have 1 and only 1 Regency. Cannot rest outside of Regency. Must spend 1 Fate per 1 delay or 5 rounds in combat or take 1 wound. Spend 1 extra Fate to leave Realm by any means.

name: Low Pain Threshold
description: Number of each kind of wound changes. 2 fewer light wounds 1 extra serious 1 extra deadly.

name: Show-off
description: Cannot use Cunning Deception to hide or disguise identity by any means.
